meanings: 관광 We'd like to stay five nights.

meanings.meaning: perish at the portals of safety

vlive.korean: 하고 이제 이 두 개를 했으면 잘 보면 또 이제... After these two, if you look closely... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 즐거운 휴닝로직🤗
vlive.english: After these two, if you look closely...

vlive.korean: 다른 코디분들과 했으면 이런 느낌이 났을까라는 생각을... I doubt that it would feel this way if we worked with other coordinators. 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
vlive.english: I doubt that it would feel this way if we worked with other coordinators.

vlive.korean: 어떤 걸 했으면 좋겠어요? what do you want me to do? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈입니다!
vlive.english: what do you want me to do?

vlive.korean: 근데 인성 씨 빨리 그거 했으면 좋겠어요, 시즌 2 맞나요? I really hope you'll do a season 2 soon. 듣기 View video SF9 : 얘드라일어나바
vlive.english: I really hope you'll do a season 2 soon.

vlive.korean: 오른쪽 밑에 거 - 네가 앨범 소개를 했으면... The one at the bottom of the right side. - You introduced the album. 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: The one at the bottom of the right side. - You introduced the album.

examples.korean: He had entertained hopes of a reconciliation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 화해를 했으면 하는 바람을 품고 있던 참이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had entertained hopes of a reconciliation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I could do with a drink! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한 잔 했으면 좋겠군! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I could do with a drink! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I wish you’d change the subject. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 화제를 바꿨으면[다른 얘기를 했으면] 좋겠군요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I wish you’d change the subject. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I would prefer it if you didn’t tell anyone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 아무에게도 말 안 했으면 좋겠어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I would prefer it if you didn’t tell anyone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I hope the police don’t ask any awkward questions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경찰이 무슨 곤란한 질문을 안 했으면 좋겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I hope the police don’t ask any awkward questions. Add to Wordbook
